body_html:
Now sess.run(A) results in array([], shape=(3, 0, 1, 10), dtype=float32) . But no value. Error remains the same for sess.run(O). I think, if someone familiar with Tensor Array, it is just a matter of few minutes. If the way, the code has been written is wrong, can anyone suggests me an alternative, but make sure that it is differentiable.
…

body:
Now sess.run(A) results in

array([], shape=(3, 0, 1, 10), dtype=float32) .

But no value. Error remains the same for sess.run(O). I think, if
someone familiar with Tensor

Array, it is just a matter of few minutes. If the way, the code has
been written is wrong, can anyone suggests

me an alternative, but make sure that it is differentiable.
